channel.title: Need Help --
channel.description:
Ok, This thread for a couple of helps i'll need, So just search through it and find 1 that you can help with. Thanks-
First Problem- (Difficulty: 1)
-Auto-Ban Noclippers
I need the code so when someone noclips, its bans them automatically. Thanks-
-------------------------------------------------------------------------
Second Problem- (Difficulty: 3)
-Adding Shops-
Need to know how to add shops, because on my previous server, I tried it, but it didnt work, like i no the autospawn and the adding items part, and the client where u change the code for the shop, And then when i log in my server, I click talk, or trade... Doesnt pop up with items at all.
-------------------------------------------------------------------------
Third Problem- (Difficulty: 3-4)
-Adding objects-
Ok, I do know how to change the starting point, But how do add objects, so when they start.. I can have some objects they can train on?
-------------------------------------------------------------------------
Fourth Problem- (Difficulty: (TO MAKE TUT, ABOUT 6-7) To copy and paste: 1-2
-Smithing-
I need a tut to add smithing on my server.
-------------------------------------------------------------------------
Fifth Problem-
-Starting Items-
How do you add items when people start my server?
Thank you all!!

item.title: Need Help --
item.dc:creator: @Angel_of_grim Angel of grim
item.description:
@Angel_of_grim wrote:

Ok, This thread for a couple of helps i’ll need, So just search through it and find 1 that you can help with. Thanks-
